review: The doctor fixed my tooth cap twice and both the time it fell off. I could never book an appointment the 3rd time.
reply_text: The appointment could not be booked as the clinic was not open due to Covid -19 . You are free to call me and talk anytime you want . A crown of the tooth falling off is a very common occurrence. It can happen due to multiple reasons . As discussed earlier, I told you that if the crown comes off we will send it back to the lab and get a new one made free of cost . But due to ongoing circumstances all labs are shut . You can contact the clinic for any clarifications .
